    Class for searching Groups within a LDAP.

      • getGroup

        public ExternalGroupVO getGroup(String groupDN)
                         throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException,
                                LdapAttributeMappingException
        Retrieves a group by its DN if the group exists
        Parameters:
        groupDN - the DN of the group to retrieve
        Returns:
        the group or null if there is no matching group
        Throws:
        org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - in case of an error while communicating with the repository
        LdapAttributeMappingException - in case the retrieved entry cannot be mapped to the VO

      • hasGroup

        public boolean hasGroup(String groupDN)
                 throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
        Checks, if the given group exists.
        Parameters:
        groupDN - The groups dn.
        Returns:
        True, if the group exists, else false.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - Exception.
